channel.title: Survival Clones basic moves / character sheet
channel.description:
This has come together a bit. I tried to make this into a 1 page character sheet and basic rules. The modes themselves get stats associated with them.
[Awake Hon/maths start](https://drive.google.com/file/d/14D5LZll9nXAk_ApnQs2l8jA0d1HJ1ntk/view?usp=drivesdk)
What’s weak or confusing? Besides the fact that the math words need expanding.
